attributes.action: have the office of the deputy PM recognise the need for private transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In great swathes of the country particularly rural areas like lincolnshire Public transport is non existent particularly at weekends and nights, giving most people and shift workers in particular no choice but to use private cars. The deputy PM seems to have no idea of the hardship caused by over taxation and regulation on ordinary hard working and low paid people. Do not pressurise people out of cars until the infrastructure is in place to replace them

rejection.details: The Office of the Deputy Prime Minister no longer exists. Please redraft with reference to the Department for Transport.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
